title: Generative AI with Large Language Models
description: This course provides an in-depth understanding of generative AI, focusing on the transformer architecture that powers large language models (LLMs). It covers training, fine-tuning, and deploying LLMs for various applications.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: This specialization helps learners understand deep learning fundamentals and build neural network architectures. It includes hands-on projects to apply deep learning in various fields.

title: Natural Language Processing Specialization
description: This specialization covers the essential techniques in natural language processing, including sentiment analysis, machine translation, and text generation using neural networks.

title: TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate
description: This certificate program teaches how to build and deploy deep learning models using TensorFlow. It includes courses on neural networks, computer vision, natural language processing, and time series forecasting.

title: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) Specialization
description: This specialization teaches the foundations and applications of GANs, including training models to generate realistic images and augmenting datasets.

title: Functions, Tools and Agents with LangChain
description: This short course focuses on using LangChain Expression Language (LCEL) to build and customize conversational agents and other LLM-based applications.
